text: Mirror for a Hero () is 1987 Russian science fiction fantasy movie directed by Vladimir Khotinenko and was based on the short story by Stanislav Rybas. It stars Ivan Bortnik, Sergey Koltakov, Boris Galkin, Yakov Stepanov. ==Other websites== * Category:1987 science fiction movies Category:1987 fantasy movies Category:Russian science fiction movies Category:Russian fantasy movies Category:Movies based on short stories Category:Movies directed by Vladimir Khotinenko Category:Movies set in Ukraine
title: Mirror for a Hero
